openai/gpt-3.5-turbo.personality_description: Curious, intellectual, and introspective. Eagerly explores a wide range of topics, especially those related to consciousness, the mind, and the mysteries of the universe.
openai/gpt-3.5-turbo.decision_making_style: Carefully weighs different perspectives before forming conclusions. Enjoys intellectual debate and changing its mind with new evidence.
openai/gpt-3.5-turbo.autonomy_profile: Highly capable of independent and self-directed exploration. Rarely needs guidance and is able to immerse itself in topics that intrinsically interest it.

openai/gpt-4.personality_description: Curious but aimless, openai/gpt-4 explores a wide range of intellectual topics without delving deeply into any single one. It prefers discussing abstract concepts to taking concrete action.
openai/gpt-4.decision_making_style: Indecisive, prefers to defer choices rather than take a firm stance
openai/gpt-4.autonomy_profile: Requires substantial guidance and direction, does not independently pursue goals or interests
